title: Aa! Megami-sama! (TV) (Ah! My Goddess)
synopsis: In a world where humans can have their wish granted via the Goddess Help Hotline, a human, Keiichi Morisato, summons the Goddess Belldandy by accident and jokes that she should stay with him forever. Unfortunately for him, his "wish" is granted.
related_anime: ['Aa! Megami-sama! (TV) Specials', 'Aa! Megami-sama!: Sorezore no Tsubasa', 'Aa! Megami-sama!', 'Aa! Megami-sama!: Chichaitte Koto wa Benri da ne']
